comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Justine Johnstone (January 31, 1895 – September 4, 1982) was an American stage and silent screen actress. She was later a pathologist and expert on syphilis. Working under her married name, Justine Wanger, she was part of the team that developed the modern intravenous drip technique. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justine_Johnstone

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the additional information Richard Arthur Norton. She had a very interesting pair or careers. Since she was known under her married name I'll ask that we add Wanger to the record in case people search for it.
